SELECT su.USER_ID AS userId, su.ORG_ID AS orgId, so.ORG_NAME AS orgName, su.USER_NAME AS userName, su.USER_PASSWORD AS userPassword, su.USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, su.USER_BITTHDAY AS userBirthday, su.USER_ADDRESS AS userAddress, su.USER_TEL AS userTel, su.USER_MOBILE AS userMobile, CASE su.USER_LOCKED WHEN '0' THEN '正常' ELSE '锁定' END AS userLocked, su.ADD_USER_ID AS addUserId, su.ADD_TIME AS addTime, su.UPDATE_USER_ID AS updateUserId, su.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, su.VERSION AS version, GROUP_CONCAT(sr.ROLE_NAME) AS roleName FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_org so ON so.ORG_ID = su.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.USER_ID = su.USER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.ROLE_ID = sur.ROLE_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND su.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%')
AND su.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
GROUP BY su.USER_ID ORDER BY su.ADD_TIME
mapper.select: SELECT su.USER_ID AS userId, su.ORG_ID AS orgId, so.ORG_NAME AS orgName, su.USER_NAME AS userName, su.USER_PASSWORD AS userPassword, su.USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, su.USER_BITTHDAY AS userBirthday, su.USER_ADDRESS AS userAddress, su.USER_TEL AS userTel, su.USER_MOBILE AS userMobile, su.ADD_USER_ID AS addUserId, su.ADD_TIME AS addTime, su.UPDATE_USER_ID AS updateUserId, su.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, su.VERSION AS version, su.USER_LOCKED AS userLocked, GROUP_CONCAT(cast(sr.ROLE_ID as char(10))) AS roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(sr.ROLE_NAME) AS roleName FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_org so ON so.ORG_ID = su.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.USER_ID = su.USER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.ROLE_ID = sur.ROLE_ID WHERE su.USER_ID = #{userId} LIMIT 1
